word:
Chapter Twenty-Five - Our Duty to the Unfortunate

     Pity for the Blind, Lame, and Afflicted.--Those who have pity for the unfortunate, the blind, the lame, the afflicted, the widows, the orphans, and the needy, Christ represents as commandment keepers, who shall have eternal life.--Testimonies, vol. 3, p. 512.
